0.text: Bug 9570  [Java Browsing] Types View not updated on deletion.

1.text: 1) Select a method in a type, i.e.

2.text: all viewers are populated, editor is visible 2) Deactivate linking between active editor and navigator in workbench  preferences 3) Deactivate auto build 3) Prespective>Show View>Navigator 4) Pin Navigator 5) Select the file of the previously selected method 6) Context Menu>Delete -> Method View flushed, Editor closed -> Type still visible in Types View ->Selecting Type possible and results in small red square in Methods View
